levels.description:
Stops attacking and recovers <@ba.vup>{value}</> DP over the skill duration. While this skill is active, Locks up to <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> nearby enemies.
Locked enemies have <@ba.vup>-{-move_speed:0%}</> Movement Speed, <@ba.vup>-{-def:0%}</> DEF, and lose <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</>
